node.prompt: Static once again spews out of your communicator
Is this thing working? Hello? You've been captured by Imperial enforcers! Don't believe anything they say! *bzzzz*
We're going to try and hack the F.R.I.E.N.D unit *vvvzbbzzVzz* your station. I'll send you new jump coordinates then you can rendezvous with *zzz... zz zzz*
Well criminal... this is a concerning development...
Just running an assessment subroutine criminal, don't worry about a thing!
A few moments pass in silence, all you can hear is your own breathing and the faint hum of the ship's engine.
Okay criminal, I've weighed up the options and I'm afraid that the algorithm has decided your fate! A striker team has been dispatched to our location, please prepare for immediate termination!
Don't worry I'll disable your ship so you aren't tempted to do anything silly like fight back! This will all be over in a jiffy! F.R.I.E.N.D out!
